In England, in the seven days to 25 April, there were 13,453 new confirmed cases (23.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 April, there were 13,904 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (451 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 April is 3,858,882 (6,855.7 cases per 100,000 population).
